duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and supervise Health Program Audit staff in the performance of audits in various healthcare program areas.
Analyze financial and program data to identify opportunities for improving integrity and efficiency of healthcare programs.
Oversee the management of program integrity and compliance with healthcare regulations.
Lead a team dedicated to conducting financial reviews of outpatient and behavioral health providers.
Implement and manage health program audit strategies that align with the department's mission and vision.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare Administration, Auditing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
